alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 26 at 3:26AM PDT until October 28 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures mainly in the upper 20s and lower 30s, but as low as 22 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures mainly in the mid 20s to lower 30s, but as low as 19 possible. * WHERE...In California, Western Siskiyou County and Central Siskiyou County. In Oregon, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Jackson County. This includes the Scott, Rogue, Klamath River, Shasta, and Illinois Valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
